title: Supplication for Paradise & Protection
description: A detailed nightly supplication seeking the specific rewards of Paradise (Salsabil, silk robes, divine company) and seeking refuge from the specific punishments of Hell, while asking for success in Laylat al-Qadr.

phrases.english: Recite every night:
O Allah, by Your mercy, admit us among the righteous.
And raise us to the highest heights,

phrases.arabic: وِبَكَاْسٍ مِنْ مَعينٍ مِنْ عَيْنٍ سَلْسَبيلٍ فَاسْقِنا،
phrases.english: And from a cup of pure water from the spring of Salsabeel, grant us to drink.
phrases.transliteration: Wa bi-ka’sin min ma‘īnin min ‘aynin salsabīlin fasqinā.

phrases.english: And by Your mercy, join us in marriage with the fair ones with wide, beautiful eyes.
And of the youths
May Allah bless him and grant him peace:
Whoever obeys the Messenger has indeed obeyed Allah; and as for those who turn away—We have not sent you as a guardian over them.
The immortal ones, as though they were hidden pearls; so serve us,

phrases.arabic: وَمِنْ ثِمارِ الْجَنَّةِ وَلُحُومِ الطَّيْرِ فَاطْعِمْنا،
phrases.english: And feed us from the fruits of Paradise and the flesh of birds,
phrases.transliteration: Wa-min thimāri l-jannati wa-luḥūmi ṭ-ṭayri fa-aṭ‘imnā,

phrases.arabic: وَمِنْ ثِيابِ السُّنْدُسِ وَالْحَريرِ وَالْإِسْتَبْرَقِ فَالْبِسْنا،
phrases.english: And clothe us in garments of fine silk, silk, and rich brocade,
phrases.transliteration: Wa min thiyābi s-sundusi wal-ḥarīri wal-istabraqi fal-bisnā.

phrases.arabic: وَلَيْلَةَ الْقَدْرِ وَحَجَّ بَيْتِكَ الْحرامِ وَقَتْلًا فى سَبيلِكَ فَوَفِّقْ لَنا،
phrases.english: And the Night of Decree, the pilgrimage to Your Sacred House, and martyrdom in Your cause; so grant us the success to attain these.
phrases.transliteration: Wa-laylatal-qadri wa-ḥajja baytikal-ḥarāmi wa-qatlan fī sabīlika fa-waffiq lanā,

phrases.english: And respond to our righteous supplications and petitions,
phrases.transliteration: wa ṣāliḥa ad-du‘ā’i wal-mas’alati fastajib lanā,

phrases.arabic: وَاذا جَمَعْتَ الأَوَّلينَ وَالأخِرينَ يَوْمَ الْقِيامَةِ فَارْحَمْنا،
phrases.english: And when You gather the former and the latter generations on the Day of Resurrection, have mercy upon us.
phrases.transliteration: Wa-idhā jama‘ta al-awwalīna wal-ākhirīna yawma al-qiyāmati farḥamnā.

phrases.english: And decree for us deliverance from the Fire.
And in Hell, do not bind us in shackles,
And do not afflict us with Your punishment and Your humiliation.
phrases.transliteration: Wa fī ʿadhābika wa hawānika falā tabtalinā.

phrases.english: And feed us not from the bitter tree nor from the foul, thorny herbage.
And do not place us with the devils,

phrases.arabic: وَفِى النَّارِ عَلى وُجُوهِنا فَلا تَكْبُبْنا،
phrases.english: And do not cast us headlong upon our faces into the Fire,

phrases.arabic: وَمِنْ ثِيابِ النَّارِ وَسَرابيلِ الْقَطِرانِ فَلا تُلْبِسْنا،
phrases.english: And clothe us not in the garments of the Fire, nor in shirts of molten pitch.
phrases.transliteration: Wa min thiyābin-nāri wa sarābīlil-qaṭirāni falā tulbisnā,

phrases.arabic: وَمِنْ كُلِّ سُوءٍ يا لا الهَ الَّا انْتَ بِحَقِّ لا الهَ الَّا انْتَ فَنَجِّنا
phrases.english: And from every evil, O You besides whom there is no god, by the truth of "there is no god but You," deliver us.
phrases.transliteration: Wa-min kulli sū'in yā lā ilāha illā anta bi-ḥaqqi lā ilāha illā anta fa-najjinā.
